description:
Akira`s made his way to Shinjuku to see Kencho, the only friend he`s still in touch with. Akira and Kencho went through a lot together in their college rugby club. Now, Kencho finds himself in a life-or-death situation. Will Akira be able to save him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le meilleur ami de la mort
ベストフレンド オブ ザ デッド
